Uses of Class
org.accada.reader.rprm.core.mgmt.alarm.AlarmControl

Packages that use AlarmControl
org.accada.reader.rprm.core   
org.accada.reader.rprm.core.mgmt.alarm   
 

Uses of AlarmControl in org.accada.reader.rprm.core
 

Methods in org.accada.reader.rprm.core that return AlarmControl
 AlarmControl AntennaReadPoint.getFailedEraseAlarmControl()
          Returns the alarm control object which controls the generation of alarms triggered by failed erase operations across the AntennaReadPoint.
 AlarmControl AntennaReadPoint.getFailedKillAlarmControl()
          Returns the alarm control object which controls the generation of alarms triggered by failed kill operations across the AntennaReadPoint.
 AlarmControl AntennaReadPoint.getFailedLockAlarmControl()
          Returns the alarm control object which controls the generation of alarms triggered by failed lock operations across the AntennaReadPoint.
 AlarmControl AntennaReadPoint.getFailedMemReadAlarmControl()
          Returns the alarm control object which controls the generation of alarms triggered by failed read operations of memory banks across the AntennaReadPoint.
 AlarmControl AntennaReadPoint.getFailedWriteAlarmControl()
          Returns the alarm control object which controls the generation of alarms triggered by failed write operations across the AntennaReadPoint, including failed writes to any of the memory banks including the tag identifier.
 

Uses of AlarmControl in org.accada.reader.rprm.core.mgmt.alarm
 

Subclasses of AlarmControl in org.accada.reader.rprm.core.mgmt.alarm
 class EdgeTriggeredAlarmControl
          This class extends AlarmControl to control alarms generated when a monitored, integer-valued, model element first crosses a threshold value (the alarmThreshold).
 class TTOperationalStatusAlarmControl
          This class extends AlarmControl to control alarms generated when a monitored model element of type OperationalStatus transitions to a new value.
 

Methods in org.accada.reader.rprm.core.mgmt.alarm with parameters of type AlarmControl
 void AlarmManager.fireAlarm(Alarm alarm, AlarmControl alarmControl)
          Fires an alarm iff all relevant conditions are fulfilled.
